original_title: Heaven Shall Burn: Live at Summerbreeze
overview: German death metal/metalcore band Heaven Shall burn perform at the Summerbreeze festival in 2008.  01 - Intro 02 - Endzeit 03 - Counterweight 04 - Profane Believers 05 - Murderers Of All Murderers 06 - The Only Truth 07 - Forlorn Skies 08 - If This Is A Man 09 - The Weapon They Fear 10 - Voice Of The Voiceless 11 - Like A Thousand Suns 12 - Black Tears 13 - Behind A Wall Of Silence
title: Heaven Shall Burn: Live at Summerbreeze
